website_summaries.verdict: Spiral stake that delivers heavy-duty performance to keep large dogs anchored.
pros: Bright yellow color will make it easier to see the stake, so you don't trip over it or hit it with a lawnmower
Lengths for the anchor range between 10" and 16", delivering excellent performance
Durable, thick steel construction to handle most sizes of dogs
cons: Hook for the cable is smaller than others

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My 80 pound lab hates being tied to this, and that is why I love it. He cannot pull this out of the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great dog tie down. I ordered a different dog tie down on Chewy.com that didnt work out. However, this product is a strong tie down that my 80 pound dog has yet to pull out of the ground or bend for that matter. The base that it has is a plus. Highly recommend especially over other tiedowns on the market.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Dog tie out anchor
customer_reviews.text: It is flush to the ground If you turn it all the way in. I used a huge heavy duty screw driver through it's loop for torque to get it flush and again to get it out of the ground when I want to relocate it. You can mow right over it. I take the chains off to mow. The dogs cannot budge it out of the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Kline

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 6 months ago and it’s holding up well. It goes into the ground nicely and does not move around. Remember to fold the little ring down before you mow! We forgot and it came right off but we were able to hammer it back in and it’s still doing it’s job well.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Good stake, tough to install.
customer_reviews.text: Seems very sturdy, I don't have any concern about it breaking any time soon. The installation was difficult. The soil here isn't hard, so I was surprised it was so difficult. My wife tried to screw it in, but could only get it halfway in. I got it a couple more inches, then got gloves to not hurt my hands. After that I got it in another couple inches. It was still sticking out 2-3" and couldn't move it anymore by hand. Ended up getting a pole to insert in the top to get additional leverage, and finally sunk it fully into the ground. Seems great once you get it installed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Utke

customer_reviews.title: I can take my dogs out without worry!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a few different types of these before. None of them come close to this one. The screw has a sharp spike and I can actually screw it in myself. I attached the ropes for my dogs Squatted and gave it a dozen yanks with my full body weight (200lbs) It did not budge! Also just tried leaving it in while mowing. I was very nervous abt braking my mower... But as advertised we could mow over it just fine. It’s not very often I’m 100% satisfied with shopping online, I am with this. ***Wrote review after using for a week
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ames

customer_reviews.title: Works well for puppy
customer_reviews.text: Great teacher for 25 lb french bulldog. We just planted it in the yard and we mow our grass at 4 inches and it goes right over the top of it. No worries. The only small downside is that sometimes the top portion that you teacher onto gets stuck down close to the ground and I have to use a screw driver to pry it up so I can clip the leash on it. It’s also rather large where you put the clip so a regular size dog leash doesn’t just hook on, I have to run the clip through the guide and clip it back to the metal leash. Works well though. Dog does not get hung up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and blends in. Ended up With 2. One for the front yard and one for the back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Wallerstein

customer_reviews.title: CANT SEEM TO GET THIS TO WORK ON ANY GROUND I TRY
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to use this on lawns, riverbanks, beaches - you name it and I have had no luck securing this into the ground. Not sure if I got the wrong size or if the ground surfaces I am attempting to use this on are not right. Either way, I have given up my attempts to use it and its basically just taking up space in my life. Would not recommend. There are other solutions that end up being easier than this.
customer_reviews.author: Coastal Girl

customer_reviews.title: Holds my strong dog
customer_reviews.text: This really works for my dog who has been a Houdini. It's a bit tough to screw into dry ground (it's much better after a little rain) but that also means that it's hard to get out of the ground for a strong doggo. We mow over it just fine due to the low profile. We bought a second one so we can keep one on each side of the house. Strong reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie Rabbitt

customer_reviews.title: Best Anchors on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tie down anchors. Needed these for a tripod hunting stand to secure it to the forest floor. I used a 15 inch 1/2 pipe as a leverage handle to bury in and they are like granite.
customer_reviews.author: GoAngus

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Got here in the prescribed time frame, using them to the down portable basketball net, have not had any major storms yet so too early to tell if they will work or not
customer_reviews.author: Some Knowledge

customer_reviews.title: Great anchor for dog leads
customer_reviews.text: This spiral anchor works great for my Australian Shepard. She has been know to wrap her chain around other spiral anchors (especially the ones with the triangle top. She can run all around with this one without getting caught up- as long as my son has it screwed all the way in the ground after cutting grass.
customer_reviews.author: Amk

customer_reviews.title: Used at tie-out stake for dog.
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy. It holds my 80 ib pit bull terrier. Granted she’s only on it to do her business and then comes back in. It has a low profile so it doesn’t shift back and forth. I can also mow right over it without having to take it out of the ground or try to go around it. I was constantly hitting the old one we had. Which is the reason we needed a new one lol. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S.

customer_reviews.title: I assume it will be Great for sand. AWFUL for everything else
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like it does in the picture however this thing is impossible to install in anything other than sand. We bought it specifically for a camping trip and never ended up using it because we couldn’t get it into the ground. The soil was not extremely rocky yet all this thing did was till up the land.
customer_reviews.author: Mens Bodega

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews, we bought this to allow us to bring out 75 pound Great Pyranees into the front yard with the rest of the family. After ensuring it was secure, we latched her on and with 3 seconds, she had ripped it out of the ground...
customer_reviews.author: Steph Abercrombie

customer_reviews.title: So worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have a Cane Corso (Italian mastiff) and she is a lunger when other dogs walk past the yard but also has anxiety when she’s left inside she can’t get this out and the lawn mower goes right over it which is great!! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works very well for our 3 year old 14lb terrier mix rescue. He's a small guy but he likes to take off at top speed and really put the anchor to the test! It holds tight in the ground and is exactly what we needed for day trips to the park and camping!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: Use for dog tie line, apartment patio. Bright enough to avoid trip hazard and heavy duty, doesn't budge when she uses all her might to chase squirrels.
customer_reviews.author: Mosun910

customer_reviews.title: Basic sturdy anchor for you headstrong doggy.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to screw into the ground, I used a long screwdriver to help twist it firmly into the ground. I stack my Corgi on it and he’s not going anywhere. Make sure to use a line appropriate for the dogs size.
customer_reviews.author: debbon49

customer_reviews.title: Quick and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to install, although I did use a drill mounted auger to loosen the ground a bit first. They hold amazingly well also, but they can be removed if needed. They are definitely worth the money if you need a ground anchor.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: We just moved and needed a way to contain our Huskies as we wait for our fence to be built. Our Huskies are strong and always love a challenge to escape from! This product has stayed secure no matter what they attempt. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice low profile ground anchor.
customer_reviews.text: Great to use for my dog's chain in the backyard. The typical anchors stick 4-6 inches out of the ground and would often get loose as the dog pulls on it. This is very sturdy and stuck in the ground really well. When you unhook the chain you can mow over it too.
customer_reviews.author: sloopjont

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like that is sturdy. We have red clay dirt so it made it hard to get in ground. It's been rainy off and on for a week and was able to get them into the ground. I use them for my 2 boxer/lab mix dogs.
customer_reviews.author: kelly brown

customer_reviews.title: Went into hard ground easily
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to ground tie my 100 + lb dog.
customer_reviews.author: Mthorsegal

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We have and XXL 145 lbs Leonberger and have no problems containing him with this stake screw. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tribulation ExodusTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: These ground screws are ok, but they are not long enough. I live in WA state and we have a lot of rocks in the ground. I got 4 of these for use as anchors for ratchet straps that go over an outdoor bldg. the went in easily but pull out easily if I tighten up the straps to much 😩 as I said good but not a 5 because of the lack of length.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Towers

customer_reviews.title: Works great and very strong
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy product. You need some leverage to screw it into the ground. I put a screwdriver through the whole and it was pretty easy to turn it into the ground. Our 60 pound husky is getting used to it and it hasn't budged in a couple weeks of use. She did get wrapped around our tree the first day so don't leave your pet alone.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Hollriegel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly like advertised! I installed it below the grass and walkway level - no trip hazard (especially with the fold down hook!). My neighbor saw it and bought one for her dog too!
customer_reviews.author: mopl22

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: If you want an anchor, buy this one. Super sturdy. I used a hammer to twist it into the ground. I read other people used a metal rod.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis real bad but the day after it rained I screwed it right into the ground with no problem, using a foot long metal bar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: So far this is a great product (a few days in). It was easy to install by using a screwdriver for torque. I like that is sits low enough that I do not need to remove it to mow the lawn. I hope that it remains secure and sturdy as our puppy gets bigger (currently 3 months & 30lbs) as she will get bigger and stronger. Metal seemed sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa F.

customer_reviews.title: Small and easy!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty impressive, given their relatively small size. And very easy to screw into our hard soil. This was just the ticket for securing our monstrous and wayward grape vine.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C.

customer_reviews.title: Good for small/older dogs, not big puppies
customer_reviews.text: Held my yellow Labrador Retriever but once he was about 50 pounds he could easily rip this thing out of the ground aaaaand in the trash it went.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Wayne

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY DUTY!
customer_reviews.text: It is very heavy duty but requires a heavy duty tool to turn into the ground. Consider wetting soil first.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B. Lewan Jr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well to keep my large puppy in the yard. Lies flat so cutting the grass isn't a problem and I don't have to remove each time. Was easy to secure in the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Renee J.

customer_reviews.title: Industrial strength
customer_reviews.text: Used to tether a fallen over tree. Worked well. Used a crowbar to turn into the ground. To hard by hand.
customer_reviews.author: CodeGrue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lead Tie down for dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Low profile product which allows for mowing the grass without risking any damage to the mower or tie down.
customer_reviews.author: K9 Legionaires

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for trampoline
customer_reviews.text: Use for tie down of trampoline. Able to mow right over and it not catch blade as long as handle down. Anchors well/VERY sturdy. Love the option of not having to unscrew and move to mow.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Top doesn't move well
customer_reviews.text: This was well made, but the top part was stuck to the stake and we had to hit it several times with a hammer to get it unstuck.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Addleman

customer_reviews.title: Not for Bloodhound
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these this summer and both are now broken. Do not use these for a bloodhound. She snapped the top off of the last one in our second weekend of camping. Would be great for a smaller dog.
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY PURCELL

customer_reviews.title: nice product.
customer_reviews.text: very nice product for dogs up to 35#. Screw in well in the sand, sand must be wet.
customer_reviews.author: Keira Ranson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great. Was able to move it around the yard as I work so I can keep an eye on the dog
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Using it to secure a garden trough to keep it from getting stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to secure my RV awning from blowing away when it gets windy. Well built and easily screw into the ground with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Shipper

customer_reviews.title: May rust
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Easy to install, even in Georgia clay. It holds my 40 pound beagle well. I am concerned about rust forming. It looks like there is some rust where the paint wasn't covering the metal. Maybe unavoidable considering the humid climate of the South? I think it will last regardless of rust, but I would avoid using it in consistently damp areas.
customer_reviews.author: K-Rae

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a labradoodle 54lbs no problems at all! i highly recommend. We have the 12 inch
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Great for large dogs
customer_reviews.text: Took some.muscle to install but overall was GREAT keeping our large dog tied down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good one to get
customer_reviews.text: This was better than expected. Fine weld. Super strong. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: steve L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great to strap down my tarps be ready to work when putting them into the ground
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and pretty easy to install! Now we can hang in the front yard with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: mary kate henson

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I gave a 90lb blue nose pit bull. He's all muscle and a great heart. It holds him with a good strong cable
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time . Easy to install and can leave in place in the yard without rusting.
customer_reviews.author: Hopeful shopper

customer_reviews.title: Just want we needed!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been really great for my 100lb pup. I am going to order another one for my front yard! I haven’t needed to remove it to mow either so that has been really helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice, heavy anchor. Penetrates the ground easily and stays in place. The bright color makes it visible for safety.
customer_reviews.author: Moe Priell

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: GOt these to help hold down sun sail straps. They work perfectly. They are strong enough to keep everything in place despite high winds. And small enough to not damage the yard.
customer_reviews.author: AlysonS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put into the ground limited as to how much weight you can put on it before it pulls out
customer_reviews.text: Spirals into the ground fine. Did pull out when I winched a laxer z
customer_reviews.author: Musilton

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install even in hard tough clay dirt!!! Well made, it’s not moving from the ground!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Tough and lays flat when not in use so is easy to mow over.
customer_reviews.author: K. Benedict

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: 50 pound dog no problem. Lets our pup explore the front yard with no worries
customer_reviews.author: N. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Attractive & Solid
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install (in wet ground) and lies flat on the ground and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the yard fits flush with grass so I can mow over top of it
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up
customer_reviews.text: I need to see if I can return this. The first time we screwed this into the ground it got bent out of shape. It is also difficult to get started into the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and very sturdy design as you can leave this in the ground and turn down the U hinge to mow grass.
customer_reviews.author: Jerminator

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a backyard with no fence
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install can withstand lots of play with big dogs and running around the yard. Used with two leashes for over a month and no issues to date.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten21

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Feels robust and seems well made. Seems well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Holds securly into the yard with my dog's lead tied to it. Mower goes over it without hitting and I didn't have a problem installing when the ground was wet from a rain storm.
customer_reviews.author: David James Heberle

customer_reviews.title: Effective and quick to screw down
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. It was easy to screw into the ground and it holds really well. The folding ring is shaped such that a large screwdriver can be placed through and then turned to screw into the ground quickly. The yellow color was not my favourite but it was easily covered with stones.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Hated mowing around my old dog lead. This one is flush with the ground and the 10” version holds my dog just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and durable
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and durable. Perfect for tethering a small dog or holding down a tarp or tent
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Keeps my dog in place and also have a set for my canopy tent.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Bergemann

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly easy to install in clay soil.
customer_reviews.text: I bought some 16" anchors before this one but they were out of them. So I bought this one. Both exceeded my expectations. They were so easy and took no time at all to install using rebarb. One of my best Amazon buys.
customer_reviews.author: diana wright

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to place in ground.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to help hold aa small tree in place, as the wind was starting to pull the roots out of the ground. The Anchor is sturdy enough to hold the tree in place.
customer_reviews.author: squila

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase. Good quality, exactly as described and delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Riiiiice

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set and the low profile won’t interfere with mowing.
customer_reviews.author: P. M. LUPTON

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and innovative
customer_reviews.text: Anchors seem very sturdy with good welds. I bought two so I could make a run for my dog outside and still be able to mow across the anchors and line without causing damage.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Shiko

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Keeps both dogs in our yard area - while we enjoy our front yard and visit with neighbors
customer_reviews.author: Steve T

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Used the product on our pups first camping trip. Worked perfectly...kept him close to camp with enough lead to for him to roam a little
customer_reviews.author: Dougee Deez

customer_reviews.title: Boat anchor
customer_reviews.text: Great anchor...used it to anchor my pontoon boat on a sandy pond and it hasn't moved an inch!
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: Solid and sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use it for holding two 45lb dog runners and they cannot pull it out of the ground. Solid and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Thompson

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Product was substantial, exceeded my expectations. Strong and did it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Marino

customer_reviews.title: Product and service A+
customer_reviews.text: Product and service flawless. Super strong hold in sand for beach camping. Requires a lever to screw in, so make sure you have something to insert through the eye for mounting. A+.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, rigid, solid
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty which I like. Had to use the claw side of a hammer to to generate enough moment the anchor into the ground. Good anchor to use for permanent applications compared to the lighter weight anchors with a handle for temporary applications.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of this anchor. Use it for my husky.
customer_reviews.author: Prizmatik

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy but almost impossible to put in the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke90201

customer_reviews.title: Stays put
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome. Have a German Shepherd and she is too active for the grand babies!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Halfmann

customer_reviews.title: Easily broken
customer_reviews.text: Began screwing into ground with use of a small screw driver. 3/4 of the way down the top broke away from the corkscrew.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & strong. I'm happy!
customer_reviews.text: I was satisfied with how snugly this secures to the ground. Much better than the products I have seen in pet stores near me.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Will

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed for my outdoor patio shade. Goes into the ground, top lays flat, and it stays put. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RMZ555

customer_reviews.title: tough
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I've found my Belgiam Maloiois hasn't broken .
customer_reviews.author: William D. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy duty! Work great for holding our patron shades down when the wind picks up!
customer_reviews.author: melissa alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as it should be.
customer_reviews.text: The product did what it said it would and is made well. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I used two to make a long tie out they work well I have a 100# dog and they are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dale-Cleaver

customer_reviews.title: 50 lb pitt bull and this works great to keep her in the yard when she goes ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a very strong, 50 lb pitt bull and this works great to keep her in the yard when she goes outside!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Hidden anchor tie
customer_reviews.text: A little early to tell but we like it so far
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: wonderful device to keep dog from roaming
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, enough room for my dog to roam around in yard without running away
customer_reviews.author: Diane Bunce

customer_reviews.title: Good investment!
customer_reviews.text: worked perfectly to secure volleyball net in sand at the windy beach. Good investment!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It is a awesome product. With cables removed you can over it without problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ken A.

customer_reviews.title: Big Help
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for giving some walk around space for a corgi who lives in a condo during the summer months, and misses his big back yard. Makes life easier for both of us.
customer_reviews.author: Lady in the Pink House

product_meta.title: Sunnydaze 16-Inch Spiral Ground Anchor with Folding Ring - Outdoor Heavy Duty Yellow Powder-Coated Steel Stake Screw - Yard Tie Out Spike for Dogs, Tents, Tarps, and Basketball Hoops
feature_bullets: INSTALL INTO THE GROUND: Earth anchor is 16 inches long x 3.5 inch diameter, weighs 1.8 pounds; Metal loop at top is 8 mm diameter thick; No digging required; Provides the proper support and base to keep your outdoor decor, temporary structures and other items firmly in place
HEAVY DUTY: Spiral stake is made from 20 mm thick heavy-duty steel and powder coated yellow to resist rust and corrosion, and also for enhanced visibility

EASY TO INSTALL: Cropped tip and spiral shape makes it easy to screw into the ground; Plus, the folding top ring provides a cleaner look, low profile and reduces the chance of tripping in high-traffic areas; Perfect for the backyard

WORKS GREAT FOR DIFFERENT USES: Metal spiraling anchor can be used for tying down tarps, tents, trees, canopies, and can even be used to tether the pet dog; Use it in the landscape, lawn, beach or camping; Also can be used to anchor outdoor decorations and inflatables so that they stay firmly in place in your front yard and won't blow away
WORRY-FREE PURCHASING: Sunnydaze Decor backs its products with a 1-year manufacturer's warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars379 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
